New Records: Syria won the Intercontinental Cup for the first time on Indian soil
Key Match Events: Syria scored in the 7th and 77th minutes
Pablo Sabbag scored an injury-time goal
Gurpreet Singh Sandhu made several key saves
Pre-Game Insights: Manolo Marquez was coaching India in his debut match
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Marquez's debut as India coach ended in disappointment
Syria secured their first title on Indian soil
Miscellaneous Highlights: Syria had a history of playing tournaments in India without winning a title
Syria had previously beaten India in the Asian Cup 2024
